workout_title: Lower Body Sculpt: Glutes, Hamstrings, and Quads

warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Perform squats without weights, focusing on form and range of motion. Complete 2 sets of 10 reps.

warmup_exercises.setup_notes: Stand next to a wall for support.
warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Swing one leg forward and backward, then side to side. Perform 10 swings per leg.
Rotate your hips in a circular motion, first clockwise, then counterclockwise. Perform 5 circles each direction.

exercises.setup: Position the barbell on your upper traps. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly pointed out.
execution: 1. Grip the barbell with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.
2. Unrack the bar and step back, setting your feet shoulder-width apart.
3. Keep your chest up and core engaged.
4. Squat down by bending your knees and hips, keeping your back straight.
5. Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
6. Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows for 8-10 reps with good form, typically 60-75% of your one-rep max (1RM).
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Position yourself on the hack squat machine with your back against the pad and shoulders under the shoulder pads.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
2. Lower the weight by bending your knees and hips, keeping your back against the pad.
3. Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows for 8-10 reps with good form, similar to the Barbell Back Squat.
exercises.additional_tips: Focus on maintaining a stable core and avoid letting your knees cave inward during the squat.

exercises.setup: Start with the bar on the ground. Pick it up like a regular deadlift for the first rep.
execution: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding the barbell with an overhand grip.
2. Keep your chest up and shoulders back.
3. Push your hips back while keeping a slight bend in your knees.
4. Lower the bar along your legs until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.
5. Return to the starting position by driving your hips forward.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows for 8-10 reps with good form, typically 60-75% of your one-rep max (1RM).
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding a barbell or dumbbells in front of your thighs.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Keep your legs straight but not locked.
2. Hinge at the hips to lower the weight down the front of your legs.
3. Keep your back straight and shoulders back.
4. Return to the starting position by engaging your hamstrings and glutes.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows for 8-10 reps with good form, similar to the Romanian Deadlift.
exercises.additional_tips: Maintain a neutral spine throughout the movement to avoid lower back strain.

exercises.setup: Sit on the ground with your upper back against a bench and a barbell over your hips.
execution: 1. Roll the barbell over your hips and position your feet flat on the ground, shoulder-width apart.
2. Drive through your heels to lift your hips until they are fully extended.
3. Keep your core engaged and pelvis neutral.
4. Lower your hips back to the starting position with control.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, typically 60-75% of your one-rep max (1RM).
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Position yourself with your upper back against a bench and one foot flat on the ground.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Extend one leg out in front of you.
2. Drive through the heel of the grounded foot to lift your hips.
3. Keep your core engaged and pelvis neutral.
4. Lower your hips back to the starting position with control.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Use a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, focusing on balance and control.
exercises.additional_tips: Ensure your knees are aligned with your toes and avoid overarching your lower back.
